alert.note: Alert for Gage; Jefferson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 12 at 7:40AM CDT until June 12 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM CDT FOR JEFFERSON AND SOUTHWESTERN GAGE COUNTIES... At 740 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles southeast of Jansen, or 6 miles east of Fairbury, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Beatrice, Fairbury, Wymore, Plymouth, Blue Springs, Odell, Diller, Daykin, Endicott, Jansen, Reynolds, Steele City, Harbine, Holmesville, Alexandria State Recreation Area, Rock Creek Station State Historical Park, Cub Creek Recreational Area, Ellis, Crystal Springs Campground and Buckley Creek Recreational Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
